targets.expr: sum by (caller, version, channel, tag, err_info) (rate(ab_ingestor_log_upload_counter_total{service=~"ab-ingestor",source_cluster="$cluster"}[1m]) * 60)

targets.query: SELECT sum("OneMinuteRate") FROM "BrokerTopicMetrics" WHERE ("typeName" =~ /type=BrokerTopicMetrics,name=BytesInPerSec,topic=$topic/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
